chapter.name: FrameLib Tutorial 6: Building a Granular Synthesiser
chapter.header: Framelib Tutorial 6: Building a Granular Synthesiser
chapter.subhead: A step-by-step guide to building a granular synthesiser in FrameLib from scratch.
chapter.body: In the previous tutorials we've built up some fundamental skills and knowledge with FrameLib. Let's put it to use and build a granular synthesiser!
